name: T-Soft E-Commerce
description:
T-Soft is a leading e-commerce technology provider with over 20 years of experience, trusted by top brands of 2K customers for its scalable, innovative solutions. With offices in Turkey and the USA and a team of 200+ professionals, T-Soft supports businesses with a proprietary all-in-one platform, flexible infrastructure, and full customization capabilities, empowering growth and seamless digital commerce.

🚀𝐔𝐧𝐥𝐨𝐜𝐤 𝐭𝐡𝐞 𝐏𝐨𝐰𝐞𝐫 𝐨𝐟 𝐑𝐞𝐚𝐥-𝐓𝐢𝐦𝐞 𝐄𝐧𝐠𝐚𝐠𝐞𝐦𝐞𝐧𝐭 𝐰𝐢𝐭𝐡 𝐇𝐞𝐥𝐨𝐫𝐨𝐛𝐨
Helorobo is T-Soft’s conversational commerce solution, transforming customer service and marketing through Meta’s Direct Messaging Services, including:  WhatsApp Business + Instagram Direct + Facebook Messenger
✅ Automate Customer Support
✅ Personalize Marketing Campaigns
✅ Boost Conversion Rates
✅ Drive Loyalty with Instant Notifications
✅ Centralized Inbox & Performance Insights
Join hundreds of top-tier e-commerce brands that trust T-Soft to drive their digital success.
focus_areas: Unified Inbox, Marketing & Sales Channel for WhatsApp, Instagram and Facebook
